name: Zombie Wave
description:
Game:

You have to protect your castle from waves of zombies. More levels you accomplish, more and bigger waves of zombies  will attack you. You will face different types of zombies. Some are faster and do not have much health, some are strong but slow. 

Keybinds: 

A, D - moving in different directions

LMB - shooting

SPACE - jumping 

Thank you for playing my game, it contains many bugs, if you see some just let me know. I hope you will have some fun playing !
